publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2584 Mr David Davidson: Commonwealth Local Government Conference, Aberdeen—That the Parliament welcomes the Commonwealth Local Government Conference, Deepening Local Democracy, to be held in the Aberdeen Exhibition and Conference Centre from 14 to 18 March 2005, bringing together local government representatives and governments from across the Commonwealth and Europe; wishes the delegates success in sharing best practice in openness and accountability for their citizens, and trusts that all will enjoy their visit to Scotland, deepening the bonds that bind Commonwealth nations together. Supported by: Alex Johnstone*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*

S2M-2584 Commonwealth Local Government Conference, Aberdeen (lodged on 14 March 2005) Mike Pringle*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Richard Lochhead*, Christine Grahame*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Murdo Fraser*, Karen Gillon*, Michael Matheson*, Brian Adam*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*
S2M-2584 Commonwealth Local Government Conference, Aberdeen (lodged on 14 March 2005) Margaret Jamieson*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Bill Aitken*
S2M-2584 Commonwealth Local Government Conference, Aberdeen (lodged on 14 March 2005) Phil Gallie*, Robin Harper*

S2M-2584 Mr David Davidson: Commonwealth Local Government Conference, Aberdeen—That the Parliament welcomes the Commonwealth Local Government Conference, Deepening Local Democracy, to be held in the Aberdeen Exhibition and Conference Centre from 14 to 18 March 2005, bringing together local government representatives and governments from across the Commonwealth and Europe; wishes the delegates success in sharing best practice in openness and accountability for their citizens, and trusts that all will enjoy their visit to Scotland, deepening the bonds that bind Commonwealth nations together. Supported by: Alex Johnstone, Mr Ted Brocklebank, Mike Pringle, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Richard Lochhead, Christine Grahame, Mr Brian Monteith, Murdo Fraser, Karen Gillon, Michael Matheson, Brian Adam, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Margaret Jamieson, Mrs Nanette Milne, Bill Aitken, Phil Gallie, Robin Harper, Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-2584 Commonwealth Local Government Conference, Aberdeen (lodged on 14 March 2005) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-2584 Commonwealth Local Government Conference, Aberdeen (lodged on 14 March 2005) Nora Radcliffe*
